court: HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT
sections: 341 of the Indian Penal Code read with Section 34 IPC
outcome: Petitioners are accused in C.C. No.1736 of 2015 of the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court-l, Alappuzha, which has arisen from Crime No.543 of 2015 of the Alappuzha North Police Station, Alappuzha
full_text: BE 2016/KER/66 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT: THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE B.KEMAL PASHA MONDAY, THE 4TH DAY OF JANUARY 2016/14TH POUSHA, 1937 Crl.MC.No. 7858 of 2015 CC 1736/2015 OF JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE COURT-, ALAPPUZHA. CRIME NO. 543/2015 OF ALAPPUZHA NORTH POLICE STATION, ALAPPUZHA. PETITIONERS/ACCUSED: 1. SIBICHAN @ STALIN, AGED 46, S/O.ELIAS, ARAYASSERY VEEDU, THUMPOLY WARD, THUMPOLY P.O., ALAPPUZHA. 2. SUNI @ LAWRANCE, AGED 44, S/O.ALPHONSE, PALLIIKKATHIYIL VEEDU, THUMPOLY WARD, THUMPOLY P.O., ALAPPUZHA. 3. KUTTAPPAN @ JACKSON, AGED 46, S/O.JOSEPH, KAKKARIYIL, THUMPOLY WARD, THUMPOLY P.O., ALAPPUZHA. BY ADV. SRILRAJAN JACOB MUNDACKAL RESPONDENT(S)/STATE AND COMPLAINANT: 1. STATE OF KERALA, REPRESENTED BY THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM - 682 031. 2. SITTAS , AGED 52, S/O.SEBASTIAN, PALLIIKKATHIYIL VEEDU, THUMPOLY WARD, THUMPOLY P.O., ALAPPUZHA - 688 126. R1 BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR SMT.SAREENA GEORGE R2 BY ADV. SRI.LP.SHANES METHAR THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 04-01-2016, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: mbr/ Barrie ornare 2016/KER/66 Cri.MC.No. 7858 of 2015 APPENDIX PETITIONER(S) ANNEXURES: ANNEXURE I. TRUE COPY OF THE FIR IN CRIME NO.543/2015 OF ALAPPUZHA NORTH POLICE STATION, ALAPPUZHA DISTRICT. ANNEXURE II. TRUE COPY OF THE FINAL REPORT/CHARGE SHEET IN CC NO.1736/2015 ON THE FILE OF JFCM COURT-I, ALAPPUZHA IN CRIME NO.543/2015 OF ALAPPUZHA POLICE STATION, ALAPPUZHA DISTRICT. ANNEXURE III. AFFIDAVIT SWORN BY THE 3RD RESPONDENT. RESPONDENT(S) ANNEXURES: NIL HTRUE COPY// P.S. TO JUDGE mbr/ a 2016/KER/66 B. KEMAL PASHA, J. ORDER Petitioners are accused in C.C. No.1736 of 2015 of the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court-l, Alappuzha, which has arisen from Crime No.543 of 2015 of the Alappuzha North Police Station, Alappuzha, registered for the offences punishable under Sections 323, 324 and 341 of the Indian Penal Code read with Section 34 IPC. 2. The matter has been amicably settled between the petitioners and the defacto complainant, who is the 2" respondent herein. The defacto complainant has filed asi 2016/KER/66 CRL.M.C.No. 7858 of 2015 uoe Annexure-lll affidavit affirming that the matter has been amicably settled between him and the petitioners and he has no complaints against the petitioners. 3. There is a connected case also in the matter registered as Crime No.430 of 2015 of the same Police Station. The matter involved in the said crime has also been settled between the parties. No criminal antecedents have been reported against the petitioners. When the matter has been amicably settled, no purpose would be served in proceeding with the matter further, and therefore, all further proceedings in C.C. No.1736 of 2015 pending before the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court-l, Alappuzha, as against the petitioners, based on Annexure-Il Final Report in Crime No.543 of 2015 of the Alappuzha North Police Station, Alappuzha, can be quashed. In the result, this Crl.M.C. is allowed and all further proceedings in C.C. No.1736 of 2015 pending before the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court-l, Alappuzha, as ee a 2016/KER/66 CRL.M.C.No. 7858 of 2015 -3:- against the petitioners, based on Annexure-Il Final Report in Crime No.543 of 2015 of the Alappuzha North Police Station, Alappuzha, are hereby quashed. Sd/- B. KEMAL PASHA, JUDGE. DSV/4/1/16 [True copy] PS. to Judge
